author: Dominic Briggs
content:
The crypto market just went through another stress test. Bitcoin dropped to $77K, $2.5B in liquidations, and yet here we are—still building, still investing.

What this cycle has taught us: fundamentals matter more than ever. The projects that survive aren't the loudest—they're the ones with real users, real revenue, and real staying power.

author: Dominic Briggs
content:
Excellent analysis from a]16z on the state of crypto regulation in 2026. The CFTC-first approach is exactly what the industry needed for institutional adoption.

[Reshared from Andreessen Horowitz]

author: Dominic Briggs
content:
Proud to share that Blockwall's latest fund is now fully deployed.

25 portfolio companies. 8 countries. One thesis: backing Europe's best crypto founders.

The next 12 months will be defining for the industry. We're ready.
